Subskills.name: Unhallowed Authority
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by damned legion.

Subskills.name: Undead Leadership
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to inspire nearby allies increasing their attack speed and damage for a short period.

Subskills.name: Abombination
Subskills.description: Summon an frenzied Abomination instead that deals increased Damage for a short period of time before exploding dealing massively increased damage to nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Infused with Blood
Subskills.description: Increases the life of damned legion based on your maximum life.

Subskills.name: Colossus Smash
Subskills.description: Attacks deal a portion of their damage to enemies around the target.

Subskills.name: Vile Shock
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to cast shockwave dealing area of effect damage and stunning monsters in a line.

Subskills.name: Mass Legion
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of damned legions.

Subskills.name: Unholy Reverberation
Subskills.description: Chance on attack for damned legion to stun nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Catastrophic Legion
Subskills.description: Summon a single damned legion with increased damage and life. Additionally grows the size of damned legion scaling from the legion's maximum life.

Subskills.name: Profane Zeal
Subskills.description: Chance to perform an additional attack.

Subskills.name: Legionnaire Agility
Subskills.description: Increases the attack speed of damned legion.

Subskills.name: Crimson Aura
Subskills.description: Damned legion has an aura around them that pulses every second dealing a portion of their life as damage to nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Thorned Revenant
Subskills.description: Damned legion gains damage return based on your total damage return.

Subskills.name: Damned Sharpshooter
Subskills.description: Instead summon a legion marksman firing explosive bolts with a giant ballista.
